WYSIWYM.model
Class SemanticGraph

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.Graph
      WYSIWYM.model.SemanticGraph
Direct Known Subclasses:
QueryGraph, QueryResultGraph
public class SemanticGraph
extends Graph

SemanticGraph holds the metadata structure/query the user is building. It has a map of nodes and edges in the graph, with id as key.

Version:
1.0 24-10-2006, 1.1 20-09-2007, 1.2 08-02-08
Author:
Feikje Hielkema
